Text: Finally the new office, love this show to death, steve carol is the man, 10/10 thanks alot.
This is EPISODE 12. The LAST SINGLE EPISODE was 1 hour long and was episode 11. Just because it was 1 hour does not make it 2 episodes. Thank you, fix it.

You're actually wrong mate, this episode is referred to as episode 13 in the production code. Hour long episodes are all counted as two episodes
If it is 2 episodes, it still only has one name. The name of this episode is obviously Ultimatum. Episode 11 was Classy Christmas.

@adrwblr, NBC disagrees with you; look at their website. Classy Christmas has two production codes of 711 and 712. Do some research.

The Christmas episodes 11&12.  This is episode 13 dipshits.  The Office has done this before.  Have a 2 part and run them like one episode instead of running the theme song in between.
